price: ¡Oh, creyentes! No se pongan a ustedes mismos por encima de Dios y Su Mensajero, y tengan temor de Dios; Dios todo lo oye, todo lo sabe.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تُقَدِّمُواْ بَيۡنَ يَدَيِ ٱللَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā tuqaddimū bayna yadayi al-lahi warasūlihi wa-ittaqū al-laha inna al-laha samīʿun ʿalīmun
